tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE soil_moisture_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  moisture_level FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Weather_Forecast (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  precipitation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE weather_forecast_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT NOT NULL,
  temperature DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  humidity DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  forecast_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherForecast (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  forecast_date DATE,
  temperature DECIMAL,
  humidity DECIMAL,
  precipitation DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE SoilMoistureLevels (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    date TIMESTAMP,
    moisture_level DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherForecast (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    date TIMESTAMP,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    forecast VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE IrrigationSchedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    date TIMESTAMP,
    duration INT,
    area_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE SmartCityZones (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    zone_name VARCHAR,
    area_id INT,
    city_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE CityStatistics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    city_id INT,
    daily_water_usage DECIMAL,
    peak_demand_time TIMESTAMP
)
